comment.author: 61289374@N05
comment._content:
Phew! there were so many days between updates this time that we thought we have lost you. I am sure the WWII and jet guys are elated, and the families, friends and acquaintances of the people in the other photos too. Now, could we, heart-bleeding, tree-hugging, Golden Age and Pioneer Era-lovers have a few photos too?
I am sure we will.
All the best and tanks for your work.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/61289374@N05] We will work on it....I think that we have a few special collections to be digitized from that era
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
